## Biography

Samuel a MScF reasearch steam student studying boreal disturbance interactions and their relationship to landscape fire exposure metrics. He completed his undergrad in forest conservation science and pure
mathematics in 2025, supporting the James Lab as research assistant since 2023. He specializes in cellular automata forest landscape simulation models and their emergent landscape properties.
